Variable Description: Category of sample (green leaf, soil, leaf litter, litter bag)
Tree species of leaf. ACRU=Acer rubrum (red maple); QURU=Quercus rubra (red oak)
Basket in which litter was collected. Basket numbers not recorded in 2008.
Unique ID for each sample analyzed in lab.
Percent biogenic silica by dry weight (0-100)
